reviewText:
Who knew there was an organized sport that centers around the use of pumpkins as missiles???

This video opens up an entirely new universe, where not only is the final event both hilarious and exhilarating, but the various journeys of the diverse teams which pursue this unique sense of glory are told in a style which I could not take my eyes off of!

The only question is whether this is a Summer Olympic sport or a Winter Olympic sport!
